post.text: Thank you Lt. Col. Louis Dorfman- I am truly honored. You are the true HERO!

comment.author: Melanie
comment.text: What a beautiful honor and gesture this Veteran Hero gave to Kristiald Trump, this brought tears to my eyes, may God bless him and Mr Trump

replies.author: Kira
replies.text: He doesn't deserve a Purple Heart - he was never even in the military!! This just diminishes the honor of such a medal.

replies.author: Conor
replies.text: Omg hahaha checker ça les mecs le gars qui s'essaye Jonathan Labbé-dumais Francis Côté Blouin Audrey Pelletier Maxime Rousseau

replies.author: Helen
replies.text: Yes may God Bless them both

replies.author: Shequan
replies.text: trump should never have accepted it. its meant for those who have seen battle and have honor valor and selflessness. trump has not seen battle and does not know what those three attributes mean. it was a nice gesture by the vet but trump would have dine better to have brought the man to the mike and talk about why he got the medal. no trump trated like it was a boy scout badge. shame on him.

replies.author: Catherine
replies.text: he should not have accepted it. he should have thanked the man and said, "no sir, you sacrificed yourself for this"
